instructions: Preheat oven to 400Â°F.
In a large bowl, whisk together olive oil, balsamic vinegar, honey, salt, and pepper.
Add bell peppers, zucchini, yellow squash, and red onion to bowl and toss to coat in dressing.
Spread vegetables out on a baking sheet and roast for 20-25 minutes or until tender and lightly browned.
In a large bowl, toss mixed greens with remaining dressing.
Top with roasted vegetables.
Serve warm or at room temperature and enjoy!
In a small bowl, whisk together soy sauce and cornstarch. Set aside.
In a large skillet or wok, heat vegetable oil over high heat.
Add steak and stir-fry for 3-5 minutes or until cooked through.
Add broccoli, garlic, and ginger. Stir-fry for 3-5 minutes or until vegetables are tender.
Stir in soy sauce mixture and cook for 1-2 minutes or until sauce thickens.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Serve hot with rice and enjoy!
Cook spaghetti according to package directions.
In a large bowl, combine ground beef, breadcrumbs, milk, parmesan cheese, egg, garlic, oregano, basil, salt, and pepper. Mix well.
Form mixture into small meatballs.
In a large skillet, heat olive oil over medium heat. Add meatballs and cook for 10-12 minutes or until browned on all sides.
Add spaghetti sauce to skillet and bring to a simmer.
Simmer for 10-15 minutes or until meatballs are cooked through.
Serve meatballs and sauce over spaghetti.
Sprinkle with additional parmesan cheese if desired.
Enjoy!
Cook pasta according to package directions
In a food processor, combine basil, parmesan cheese, pine nuts, and garlic. Pulse until finely chopped.
Add olive oil and pulse until smooth.
Drain pasta and toss with pesto sauce.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Serve hot and enjoy!
In a small bowl, whisk together soy sauce and cornstarch. Set aside.
In a wok or large skillet, heat vegetable oil over high heat.
Add chicken and stir-fry for 3-5 minutes or until cooked through.
Add bell peppers, onion, snow peas, garlic, and ginger. Stir-fry for 3-5 minutes or until vegetables are tender.
Stir in soy sauce mixture and cook for 1-2 minutes or until sauce thickens.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Serve hot with rice and enjoy!
